Description: Specifies the directory where the relevant weather data ist stored that is specified at ``atlite/cutouts`` configuration. Both ``sarah`` and ``era5`` work.
Specifies the solar panel technology and its characteristic attributes.
Specifies the tilt angle (or slope) of the solar panel. A slope of zero corresponds to the face of the panel aiming directly overhead. A positive tilt angle steers the panel towards the equator.
Specifies the `azimuth <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Azimuth>`_ orientation of the solar panel. South corresponds to 180.°.
Allowable density of solar panel placement.
A correction factor for the capacity factor (availability) time series.

Values: Any subset of the `CORINE Land Cover code list <http://www.eea.europa.eu/data-and-maps/data/corine-land-cover-2006-raster-1/corine-land-cover-classes-and/clc_legend.csv/at_download/file>`_
Description: Specifies areas according to CORINE Land Cover codes which are generally eligible for solar panel placement.
Switch to exclude `Natura 2000 <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Natura_2000>`_ natural protection areas. Area is excluded if ``true``.
Method to compute the maximal installable potential for a node; confer :ref:`renewableprofiles`
To avoid too small values in the renewables` per-unit availability time series values below this threshold are set to zero.
